name: Muneeb Ur Rehman
title: Full Stack Developer | .NET | Angular | SQL
summary: Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable ERP systems, APIs, and enterprise web applications using .NET, Azure, and modern front-end frameworks (React, Angular). Specialized in Microsoft Dynamics GP customization, SQL performance optimization, and CI/CD automation. Proven leader in mentoring teams, driving digital transformation, and delivering secure, high-performance solutions for global clients.
skills: C#, .NET (Core, MVC, Web API), ASP.NET, Entity Framework Core

highlights: End-to-end ERP system development with .NET 9 and React.
Built CI/CD pipelines with GitLab and Docker, streamlining deployments.
Optimized PostgreSQL & ClickHouse for improved reporting and reduced costs.
Developed HIPAA-compliant healthcare platform using .NET 7 & Azure SQL.
Automated invoicing, PDF generation, and email notifications.
Enhanced Razor Pages UI with jQuery for better client experience.
Architected enterprise applications with ASP.NET MVC & .NET 7.
Implemented Identity Server for secure authentication & authorization.
Designed Azure-based services for real-time data processing.
Customized Microsoft Dynamics GP ERP, boosting finance operations.
Integrated biometric and face scanning systems for 5,000+ employees.
Directed in-house HRM & POS app development, cutting vendor costs.
Developed and published Android games on Google Play Store.
Designed immersive environments and wrote efficient C# game scripts.
Built responsive UI/UX for mobile gameplay.

projects.name: ERP System for Textile Industry
projects.description: An enterprise ERP platform developed to streamline finance, HR, and operations for a textile company.
highlights: Customized Microsoft Dynamics GP ERP with in-house modules.
Integrated biometric devices for attendance tracking of 5,000+ employees.
Improved financial reporting speed by 30% with optimized SQL queries.

projects.name: Healthcare Compliance Platform
projects.description: A HIPAA-compliant web application enabling secure patient data management, billing, and reporting.
highlights: Developed core backend using .NET 7 and Azure SQL.
Automated invoicing, PDF reports, and email notifications.
Enhanced usability with interactive Razor Pages and jQuery.

projects.name: Cloud-Based ERP Reporting System
projects.description: A reporting solution for ERP systems designed to handle large-scale financial and operational datasets.
highlights: Optimized PostgreSQL & ClickHouse queries, reducing data processing costs by 25%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitLab and Docker.
Delivered real-time dashboards for executives and stakeholders.

projects.name: Human Resource Management System (HRMS)
projects.description: A complete HRM system built from the ground up, covering the entire employee lifecycle from joining to resignation.
highlights: Designed and developed modules for payroll, salary-on-roll, leave management, and clearance workflows.
Implemented user-based access rights for secure role management.
Integrated with biometric devices (fingerprint, barcode) for attendance tracking.
Connected with ERP for seamless financial and operational reporting.
Automated reporting with SSRS for HR and finance departments.

projects.name: Loom Management System
projects.description: A web-based control and monitoring panel for weaving machines, providing detailed production tracking, reporting, and efficiency analytics.
highlights: Developed panel to monitor loom status and machine performance in real time.
Enabled supervisors to control weaving functions and track downtime.
Built reporting dashboards to measure production efficiency and output trends.
Integrated with ERP for unified textile production management.

projects.name: Android Games (Unity3D)
projects.description: Multiple mobile games developed and published on Google Play Store.
highlights: Designed immersive gameplay and responsive UI/UX.
Published Android titles gaining thousands of downloads.
Implemented efficient C# game scripts for smooth performance.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience.
highlights: Developed a responsive and modern portfolio website using Angular.
Showcased projects, skills, and professional experience effectively.
Implemented SEO best practices to enhance online visibility.
Completed coursework in software engineering, database systems, and distributed computing.
Graduated with strong focus on .NET development, web technologies, and cloud computing.
Led multiple academic projects including an ERP module and mobile applications.
Actively participated in coding competitions and university hackathons.
Developed a final year project integrating .NET, SQL Server, and cloud services.
